author: weaver
msg: fixed filterset for jetspeed.properties on the build.portal goal.

author: weaver
msg: Instead of using the #parse() approach to include additional styles, I changed the templates to us a <link> tag instead.  This
keeps the finally rendered code a little more readable and decreases page size.
The aggregators now use a content-server resolvable (content/jetspeed/css/styles.css) url instead of the fully resolved path

author: weaver
msg: Use checked exceptions to indicate a failure in retrieving/creating windows instead of consuming and logging.

author: weaver
msg: Use checked exceptions to indicate a failure in rendering instead of consuming and logging.

author: weaver
msg: Added an id to the portal-layout section.
